sentences.sContent: Rising diagonally from the ground to the right of Venus is the band of our Milky Way Galaxy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rising diagonally from the ground to the right of Venus is the band of our Milky Way Galaxy.
sentences.sCn: 从地面斜对角向金星的右上方，可以看到我们的银河系的光带。

words.tran: 斜向移动；循对角线方向移动
与…斜向地成一行；使对角线化

sentences.sContent: The sandbank was uncertain, like quicksand under his feet.
sentences.sCn: 这个沙丘不结实，像他脚下的流沙一样。

trans.tranOther: wet sand that is dangerous because you sink down into it if you try to walk on it

sentences.sContent: In matrilinear societies the real head of the family is the mother's brother.
sentences.sContent_eng: In matrilinear societies the real head of the family is the mother's brother.
sentences.sCn: 在母系社会中，家庭里真正的头领是妈妈的兄弟。

words.tran: 女家长制社会；母权制时代；母系社会
母权制；女家长制；女族长制；母系氏族
出自母亲或女性祖先的名
